name: Cosmic Raider
description:
Cosmic Raider is a short project that was developed by a two person team over the period of 6 weeks for a Game Development Challenge at the Luxembourg Tech School. Having won second place in the challenge, we wanted to upload our game here so you can try it out. Enjoy! :)

CONTROLS:

-WASD to move

-SPACE to jump

-Left-click to collect treasures and Right-click to open chests.

FREE ASSETS FROM UNITY WHICH WE USED BUT DO NOT OWN:

  • Terrain models and materials: HexLands Low Poly Style - RRFreelance/PiXelBurner
  • Chest models and materials: Reinforced Wooden Chest - IArtemov
  • Gem models: Simple Gems Ultimate Animated Customizable Pack - AurynSky
  • Rock models: Low poly styled rocks - Daniel Robnik
